namuth mbaaba mudal aayeajanaya ,nawa wyapara arabuma aadiyehidi hodinma soya bala katayuthuwala yediya yuthuyi.siyaluma waya kirimi sidukala yuththe mana awabodhayen pasuwamaya.් raukiya wyapara aadiyehi dida nosalakimathbawa sa`daha ida nothabimata wagabala ganna.manasika washayen yami pidakari bawak danenu atha.siyaluma labimi ,usaswimi,nawa raukiya aadiya himi wanne badhaka madaya.balaporoththu itu wimata pumadayan athi wima ho samahara balaporothathu itu wima awasana mohothedi ahimi wiya hakiyi.wiwahaya ,ge dora katayuthu ,sewa sthana aadiye katayuthu waladi nisi agayimak nolabiya haki athara manasika washayen pidawata karunu yede.
